data.title: Home
data.meta_description: St. James Church in Louisville, Kentucky exists to connect people to Jesus and one another.
data.meta_site_name: ST. JAMES CHURCH, EVANGELICAL REFORMED 3535 TAYLOR BOULEVARD, LOUISVILLE, KY 40215 OFFICE@STJAMESLOU.NET | 502.366.8884
data.text:
The Gospel

God is Holy, Holy, Holy

All humanity is fallen and in a state of sin

God judges each sinner and the penalty for sin is death

We cannot pay our own sin debt and earn forgiveness for sin by our works

God, being rich in mercy, sent His Son, Jesus Christ, to pay your sin debt and give you eternal life with Him in heaven

How do I receive this gift?

Vertical Divider
